languages.text: "После того, как канцлер Версериан вынужденно покинула пост, а секретарь Скаландр, кхм..." {n}Мужчина мнется, обдумывая, стоит ли продолжать эту тему.{/n} "Должен отметить, я ожидал худшего. Но мои предшественники честно исполняли долг перед династией, и потому сейчас на мире-столице все довольно стабильно".

traits.locale_text: "После того, как канцлер Версериан вынужденно покинула пост, а секретарь Скаландр, кхм..." {n}Мужчина мнется, обдумывая, стоит ли продолжать эту тему.{/n} "Должен отметить, я ожидал худшего. Но мои предшественники честно исполняли долг перед династией, и потому сейчас на мире-столице все довольно стабильно".

languages.text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."
languages.original_text: "После того, как канцлер Версериан вынужденно покинула пост, а секретарь Скаландр, кхм..." {n}Мужчина мнется, обдумывая, стоит ли продолжать эту тему.{/n} "Должен отметить, я ожидал худшего. Но мои предшественники честно исполняли долг перед династией, и потому сейчас на мире-столице все довольно стабильно".

traits.locale_text: "After Chancellor Werserian had been forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

languages.text: «Después de que la canciller Werserian se viera obligada a abandonar el cargo y el secretario Scalander...». {n}Carraspea, contemplando a todas luces un cambio de tema.{/n} «Bueno, debo admitir que esperaba lo peor. Pero mis predecesores sirvieron a la dinastía fielmente, y es gracias a ellos que la situación en el mundo capital es tan estable como es posible».
languages.original_text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

traits.locale_text: «Después de que la canciller Werserian se viera obligada a abandonar el cargo y el secretario Scalander...». {n}Carraspea, contemplando a todas luces un cambio de tema.{/n} «Bueno, debo admitir que esperaba lo peor. Pero mis predecesores sirvieron a la dinastía fielmente, y es gracias a ellos que la situación en el mundo capital es tan estable como es posible».

languages.text: 「ヴェルセリアン議長が退任させられ、スカランダー長官が…」{n}彼は咳払いをして、話題を変えようとしているようだ。{/n}「私は最悪の事態を予想していました。しかし、私の前任者たちは王朝に忠実に仕えました。だからこそすべてが首都惑星のように安定しているのです」
languages.original_text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴェルセリアン議長が退任させられ、スカランダー長官が…」{n}彼は咳払いをして、話題を変えようとしているようだ。{/n}「私は最悪の事態を予想していました。しかし、私の前任者たちは王朝に忠実に仕えました。だからこそすべてが首都惑星のように安定しているのです」

languages.text: “韦尔森宰相被迫离职，而斯卡兰德秘书……”{n}他清了清嗓子，显然打算换个话题。{/n}“嗯，我必须承认，我之前已经做好了最坏的打算。不过，众多前任宰相尽职尽责地为王朝服务。正因如此，首都世界目前一切都非常稳定。”
languages.original_text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森宰相被迫离职，而斯卡兰德秘书……”{n}他清了清嗓子，显然打算换个话题。{/n}“嗯，我必须承认，我之前已经做好了最坏的打算。不过，众多前任宰相尽职尽责地为王朝服务。正因如此，首都世界目前一切都非常稳定。”

languages.text: "Nachdem Kanzlerin Werserian ihr Amt niederlegen musste und Sekretär Scalander ..." {n}Er räuspert sich und denkt offensichtlich über einen Themawechsel nach.{/n} "Nun, ich muss gestehen, ich habe mit dem Schlimmsten gerechnet. Aber meine Vorgänger haben der Dynastie pflichtbewusst gedient, und nur deshalb ist alles hier auf der Hauptwelt so stabil, wie es nur sein kann."
languages.original_text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem Kanzlerin Werserian ihr Amt niederlegen musste und Sekretär Scalander ..." {n}Er räuspert sich und denkt offensichtlich über einen Themawechsel nach.{/n} "Nun, ich muss gestehen, ich habe mit dem Schlimmsten gerechnet. Aber meine Vorgänger haben der Dynastie pflichtbewusst gedient, und nur deshalb ist alles hier auf der Hauptwelt so stabil, wie es nur sein kann."

languages.text: « Après que le chancelier Werserian s'est vu contraint de quitter ses fonctions et que le secrétaire Scalander... {n}Il s'éclaircit la gorge et songe manifestement à changer de sujet.{/n} Ma foi, je dois admettre que je m'attendais au pire, mais mes prédécesseurs ont fidèlement servi la dynastie, raison pour laquelle le monde-capitale jouit actuellement d'une certaine stabilité. »
languages.original_text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."

traits.locale_text: « Après que le chancelier Werserian s'est vu contraint de quitter ses fonctions et que le secrétaire Scalander... {n}Il s'éclaircit la gorge et songe manifestement à changer de sujet.{/n} Ma foi, je dois admettre que je m'attendais au pire, mais mes prédécesseurs ont fidèlement servi la dynastie, raison pour laquelle le monde-capitale jouit actuellement d'une certaine stabilité. »

languages.text: "Şansölye Werserian'ın görevinden ayrılmak zorunda kalmasının ardından Yazman Scalander..." {n}Konuyu değiştirmeyi düşündüğü aşikâr bir şekilde boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "İtiraf etmem gerekir ki en kötü senaryoyu bekliyordum. Fakat seleflerim, hanedanlığa büyük bir sadakatle hizmet etti. Bundandır ki her şey, şu sıralar başdünyada olabildiğince istikrarlı gidiyor."
languages.original_text: "After Chancellor Werserian was forced to leave office, and Secretary Scalander..." {n}He clears his throat, clearly considering a change of subject.{/n} "Well, I must admit, I expected the worst. But my predecessors served the dynasty dutifully, which is why everything is currently as stable as it can be here on the capital world."
